attributes.action: Refute and Refuse Lockdowns by Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details: Under the circumstances there is apparently a pandemic. This should not stop the freedom of movement for the residents born within the UK. This is our own freedom and as individuals under the European rules are able to roam as and where.
attributes.background: Freedom for the British public  to move within their country without restrictions (freemason act)

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469
